item.title: 10 Best Movie Characters Like Wicked's Glinda
item.description: Glinda's humor and positive attitude have made her one of the most popular Wicked characters, and several other movies feature similarly perky leads.

item.title: Jensen Ackles's Batman Gets An Awesome Batsuit, Batcycle And Yellow Utility Belt In Stunning DC Art
item.description: The popular fan-casting of Jensen Ackles as James Gunn's Batman comes to life through new DC Universe art, including him suited up as the DC icon.

item.title: Charlie's Angels Stars Reunite For Conversation With Demi Moore Following Her Substance Oscar Nom
item.description: The Charlie’s Angels cast reunites to celebrate Demi Moore’s Oscar nod for The Substance, reflecting on her raw portrayal of a fading Hollywood actor.
